description:
go/types: be more robust in presence of multiple errors

- better documentation of Check
- better handling of (explicit) internal panics
- gotype: don't stop after 1st error

messages.text:
*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=1e891021e069 ***

go/types: be more robust in presence of multiple errors

- better documentation of Check
- better handling of (explicit) internal panics
- gotype: don't stop after 1st error

R=adonovan, r
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7406052

Hello adonovan@google.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

LGTM
